item.title: Morgan Stanley's Jonas names struggling Tesla a top pick, sees nearly 50% comeback
item.description: Analyst Adam Jonas has an overweight rating on the stock, and his $430 price target implies about 46.8% potential upside for Tesla shares.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts are upbeat on the long-term potential of these stocks
item.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service spotlights three stocks favored by Wall Street, including Booking Holdings and Visa.

item.title: China investing risks havenâ€™t gone away. Wall Street shares some of its safer plays
item.description: As excitement over DeepSeek moderated, JPMorgan gave its clients a warning: "Be careful: U.S.-China risks back in focus."

item.title: Hedge funds are buying more of these 'rising star' stocks, according to Goldman
item.description: A change in hedge fund popularity could signal where a stock is headed in the months to come, and there are some that may be poised for future gains.

item.title: Activist Elliott takes a stake in Aspen Technology and pushes back on an offer from Emerson
item.description: Elliott Investment Management has a $1.5 billion stake in Aspen Technology, and the activist disagrees with a tender offer from Emerson Electric.
